Sinopse: Ronnie and Vikram are brothers who share an unbreakable bond. Their journey begins when a certain turn in events, leads Vikram to travel. On this trip, he gets kidnapped by people. Ronnie goes on a rampage of destruction to see his brother safe, even if it means that he independently has to take on an entire country.—Fox Star Hindi
